bill_title: to revise the definition of real estate salesperson.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the definition of real estate salesperson. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 36-21A-12 be amended to read as follows: 36-21A-12. For the purposes of this chapter, a real estate salesman salesperson is any person who for compensation or consideration is associated with a real estate broker, to sell or offer to sell, or to buy or offer to buy, or to negotiate the purchase or , sale , lease, rental, or exchange of real property, or of the property's improvements, or any business opportunity or business, or its goodwill, inventory, or fixtures, or any interest therein, or to sell or offer to sell, or to buy or offer to buy, or to negotiate the purchase or , sale , lease, rental, or exchange of a mobile or manufactured home which has been registered under the provisions of chapters 32-3 to 32-5B, inclusive . A salesman salesperson may give opinions of value for purposes of purchase, sale , lease, rental, or exchange of real property. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the definition of real estate salesperson. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 36-21A-12 be amended to read as follows: 36-21A-12. For the purposes of this chapter, a real estate salesman salesperson is any person who for compensation or consideration is associated with a real estate broker, to sell or offer to sell, or to buy or offer to buy, or to negotiate the purchase or , sale , lease, rental, or exchange of real property, or of the property's improvements, or to sell or offer to sell, or to buy or offer to buy, or to negotiate the purchase or , sale , lease, rental, or exchange of a mobile or manufactured home which has been registered under the provisions of chapters 32-3 to 32-5B, inclusive . A salesman salesperson may give opinions of value for purposes of purchase, sale , lease, rental, or exchange of real property. BILL HISTORY 1/13/98 First read in Senate and referred to Commerce. S.J. 113 1/20/98 Commerce Place on Consent Calendar. 1/21/98 Second reading of consent calendar items. S.J. 147 1/21/98 Senate Do Pass, Passed, AYES 34, NAYS 0. S.J. 147 1/22/98 First read in House and referred to Judiciary. H.J. 190 2/14/98 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/14/98 Judiciary Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 10, NAYS 1. H.J. 689

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the definition of real estate salesperson. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. For the purposes of this chapter, a real estate salesman salesperson is any person who for compensation or consideration is associated with a real estate broker, to sell or offer to sell, or to buy or offer to buy, or to negotiate the purchase or , sale , lease, rental, or exchange of real property, or of the property's improvements, or any business opportunity or business, or its goodwill, inventory, or fixtures, or any interest therein, or to sell or offer to sell, or to buy or offer to buy, or to negotiate the purchase or , sale , lease, rental, or exchange of a mobile or manufactured home which has been registered under the provisions of chapters 32-3 to 32-5B, inclusive .
